<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Whirlwind Toss](/Feats.aspx?ID=2758) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 77</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Collateral Thrash](/Feats.aspx?ID=171)

**Requirements**
You have a foe [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20).

</column>

---

You whirl a foe to smash into all nearby creatures before throwing them far away in imitation of the techniques of your rival, Ran-To. You [Thrash](/Feats.aspx?ID=156). During this Thrash, your Collateral Thrash feat applies to all foes adjacent to you. You can then throw the grabbed creature 10 feet, where they fall [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

 If the foe you choose for Collateral Thrash is also adjacent to you, they attempt only one save and take the damage only once.

<title level="2">Capstone Feats</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 75</row>

Player characters can select one of the following new class feats for their 20th-level class feat upon entering the _Glass Lighthouse_ or by meditating on the cushion in area H4.

**Related Feats**: [All the Time in the World](/Feats.aspx?ID=2744), [Dance of Intercession](/Feats.aspx?ID=2745), [Demon's Hair](/Feats.aspx?ID=2746), [Everdistant Defense](/Feats.aspx?ID=2747), [Extradimensional Stash](/Feats.aspx?ID=2748), [Head of the Night Parade](/Feats.aspx?ID=2749), [Heart of the Kaiju](/Feats.aspx?ID=2750), [Plum Deluge](/Feats.aspx?ID=2751), [Ruby Resurrection](/Feats.aspx?ID=2752), [Scapegoat Parallel Self](/Feats.aspx?ID=2753), [Sever Space](/Feats.aspx?ID=2754), [Time Dilation Cascade](/Feats.aspx?ID=2755), [Vitality-Manipulating Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2756), [Vivacious Afterimage](/Feats.aspx?ID=2757), [Worldsphere Gravity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2759)
name: Whirlwind Toss
